content.body: annevk: for the fetch issue, can we count on client to always be task destination? `useParallelQueue` seems to change that, e.g. for sync XHR but I guess it's not in use much?

content.body: annevk: only sync-xhr uses parallel queue from what I could gather. Also there are barely any callers of `processResponseEndOfBody` once we do the automatic reporting. From what I see it's OK to use the regular task destination and perform both operations
